channel.title: InYourBones Daily Music News
channel.description: Top 5 daily music stories handpicked by InYourBones

item.title: Lorne Michaels Would Have Invited Sinéad O’Connor on SNL’s 50th Anniversary Special
item.description: 🎤 Imagine Sinéad O’Connor on SNL's 50th anniversary! The ultimate dream team 💫 #SNL50 #MusicLegends

item.title: Sabrina Carpenter Celebrates One-Year Anniversary of ‘Short n’ Sweet’ Ahead of ‘Man’s Best Friend’
item.description: 🎉 Cheers to Sabrina Carpenter on ‘Short n’ Sweet’ anniversary! Excited for ‘Man’s Best Friend’ drop! 🐶🎶 #SabrinaCarpenter #NewMusic

item.title: Mastodon Pay Tribute To Brent Hinds At First Show Since His Death
item.description: 🤘🎸 Let's raise our horns to @mastodonmusic as they honor Brent Hinds at their epic comeback show! Rock on! 🤘🔥 #Mastodon #TributeToShow

item.title: Matthew McConaughey Lines Up Zach Bryan, John Mayer, & More For Poems & Prayers Book Tour
item.description: Alright, alright, alright! 🌟 Matthew McConaughey is hitting the road with a star-studded lineup for his Poems & Prayers book tour! 📚🎶 #BookTourGoals

item.title: “Follow Your Bliss” and Buy The Woodstock Cabin Owned by The B-52s’ Kate Pierson
item.description: Ready to rock out like a B-52? 🌟 Get your groove on in The Woodstock Cabin once owned by Kate Pierson! 🏠🎶 #RockAndRollDreams
